hero_text: Science, public health, and global health through the lens of equity and love-thy-neighbor.
name: Friendly Neighbor Epidemiologist
paid_subscription_benefits: Post comments and join the community
author_bio: Welcome! I'm a PhD epidemiologist and write on public health issues through the lens of neighboring. My work has been featured in TIME Magazine, Christianity Today, the Washington Post, and NPR and read in 143 countries. *All thoughts are my own.*

sections.name: Welcome the Kingdom

sections.name: Beautiful Jesus
sections.description: A bi-weekly reflection on the life of Jesus and its meaning for our lives today.
